reviews.review_msg: Lisa is a great prof, and enthusiastic about sustainability. Highly recommend!

Yupin was very kind and understanding. The class was easy and consisted of many group presentations and papers. Interesting cases about the industry but she doesn't teach anything outside of the case so you don't learn much from this class.

Didn't learn anything from the prof, not a single marketing theory was taught!! The class is mainly student led lecture, the prof was doing nothing. There is no grading scheme and syllabus for each assignment. The class average is superrrr high. So DO NOT TAKE 446 WITH HER!! PERIODDD!!!!!
She is super nice. Mark very fairly. participation is encouraged. Easy materials. But strong accent.

I learned a lot from Robert in BUS 446 (Marketing Strategy). He is a very knowledgable prof with a good attitude toward helping students. Lectures are engaging as the majority is spent in class discussion about the weeks case reading. No exams, only projects and assignments. Not easy, but fair, marking.
Best prof I've ever had, had him for b2b as well as marketing strategy. Got A+ in both!! Highly recommend, he has a very laid back way of teaching and is pretty funny
Awesome teacher, dynamic, passionate and very interesting
I have never bothered to rate a prof, But Adam is so great that i had spread his awesomeness. The best prof by far.

Not sure if everyone will appreciate this but I loved the uncensored enthusiasm/craziness. Very engaging speaker, shares cool marketing tidbits ex. quality formula, and dissects cases creatively. I found the weird/boring cases like Shouldice and Curled Metal to be the coolest actually, and I also liked the cool trading assignment. Recommended!
Adam is an awesome teacher! You need to take Adam Mills if you are enrolled in Beedie.

Simply put, Adam is an incredible professor. He has passion for his job and genuinely wants his students to succeed. Adam will go out of his way to help you, whether it is with academic or work stuff. If you put the time and effort in, you will learn a great amount and succeed. Adam readies you for the real world, so be prepared to work.
Best prof at SFU. period. If you are in business, you have to take this class! You learn stuff that's actually relevant to your future career, and you'll have a great time.

Best professor I've ever taken a class with. He really knows how to engage the class and steer discussions. A large part of your marks is based on class participation though. His teaching style rewards learning, more so than doing things to attain a good grade. I highly recommend taking a class with Adam.
Awesome prof! It shows he likes teaching. Really encourages class participation. You gotta be willing to speak freely in a class environment. Really great with business cases

Best prof I have ever had at SFU.  He's really easy going, very educated, and is always willing to help. I always look forward to going to his class.  Love his teaching style, nothing on text. Every week, we just read a case and have a class discussion for 2 hours, and you'd be amazed to find out how much you can actually learn from peers and him
